title: Chronicles of the Canongate, 1st Series
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: "Adzooks!" exclaimed the bailiff--"sure Harry Wakefield, the nattiestlad at Whitson Tryste, Wooler Fair, Carlisle Sands, or Stagshaw Bank, isnot going to show white feather?

title: Waverley Novels. (Abbotsford edition.)
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: " Adzooks !" exclaimed the bailiff— " sure HarryWakefield, the nattiest lad at Whitson Tryste,Wooler Fair, Carlisle Sands, or Stagshaw Bank, isnot going to shew white feather ? Ah, this comesof living so long with kilts and bonnets — men forget the use of their daddies."
